text: Stephanie March is returning to Law & Order : Special Victims Unit! The actress, who played fan - favorite ADA Alex Cabot in more than 90 episodes of SVU, will guest - star in an episode slated to air in April, EW has learned. The hour, titled “ Sunk Cost Fallacy, ” features Benson ( Mariska Hargitay ) crossing paths with her old friend Cabot during the search for an abducted young woman and her daughter. “ It is a thrill to welcome Stephanie back to the SVU family, even for a short visit, ” executive producer Michael Chernuchin says. “ She is, and will always be, part of SVU ’ s DNA. ” March, whose recent credits include Odd Man Out and Nightcap, joined the long - running NBC
